settings.heading: Soul Baby Gifts is taking baby gifting to the next level

settings.text:
Soul Baby Gifts is set to revolutionise baby gifting in Australia. We believe that a fully personalised and customised baby gifting service is well overdue.

It is such a special occasion when a baby is born, and we understand the importance of celebrating the new arrival. We also think that it's nice to spoil the new parents as well. So not only will you discover gifts for babies, but products that you can add to your gifts that have been specifically chosen for the parents. French champagne, chocolates, candle bath and body products from beauty's got soul and other treasures like silk eye masks.

For great first impressions, we know that the gift needs to be delivered on time and the packaging needs to be exquisite. We ensure that the products are of superior quality and the presentation is beyond compare: Next Level.

Our beautiful vegan leather suitcases and vegan leather gift bags are a major focus of the gift: not just a throw away part of the packaging. It is important for us to create gifts where the packaging is a keepsake and re-usable for many years to come.

What makes these baby gifts even more personalised and super special is our in-house ability to monogram the baby gift packaging. We have chosen a few of our favourite fonts. There's a font to cover all the bases. Playful, Bold, Royal and Stylish. We'll monogram your baby name onto the packaging for maximum Wow! And guess what..We won't charge you any extra.

We know that customisation, personalisation and relevancy in your online shopping experience is here to stay. So you can create your own baby gift and fully customise this with your special touches. Firstly you can choose either a baby suitcase (grey, pink or blue) or a super practical vegan leather draw string bag.

Then it's time to choose the items that you would like in your gift. With over 200 individual items on offer, you are sure to find a combination of baby gifting items that you will be so proud to give. We hope you enjoy our BUILD A GIFT centre of baby gifting excellence.

Then there is the curation of the baby gifts. Choosing brands and products that fancy mums love and curating inspirational combinations that spark joy. If you are short on time and would like to trust in the experience of Leonie Henzell and her baby gifting experience accumulated since 2004, then rest easy. We have a gift for you.

If you are a corporate customer, we know that your choice will be conservative and elevated above the ordinary. We are here to make you look good. We will create a lasting memory for your client or staff member. Your brand and personal relationship will be enhanced by choosing Soul Baby Gifts as your baby gifting partner. We would love to work with you on a regular basis. So reach out with the contact details below.

Most importantly, your gifts will be curated, designed and lovingly packed by the same team of extra-ordinary humans at beauty’s got soul. Yes. It’s true! beauty’s got soul and Soul Baby Gifts are in the same Magical Pony Tales stable of brands. We are a customer centric bunch, oozing kindness and are focussed on how good you look. We can’t wait to meet you. Don't be afraid to say Hi..

Leonie Henzell

Founder and CEO

Soul Baby Gifts
